name: OC-10 Octave
details:
Compact octave pedal producing notes one octave lower and two octaves lower than the direct signaCompact octave pedal producing notes one octave lower and two octaves lower than the direct signal
Carefully designed circuit for accurate octave notes
Buffer bypass
100% Analog signal path
Zinc-alloy die cast casing to withstand wear and tear
Heavy duty metal pedal switch and on/off status LED
Easy-to-use, readily accessible knobs onboard
Great tone with low noise level
Individual octaves and dry signal control knobs for creating sound variations
